abstract: The winter fashion issue starts with our cover star Patti Smith and a profile of the musician, and photographer, by A.O. Scott.
snippet: The winter fashion issue starts with our cover star Patti Smith and a profile of the musician, and photographer, by A.O. Scott.
lead_paragraph: The winter fashion issue starts with our cover star, the musician and photographer Patti Smith, and a profile of her by A.O. Scott. Inside, the actress Kirsten Dunst talks about awards, playing dress up and Hitchcock; the Arctic Monkeys show what life on the road is like; and Henry Louis Gates Jr. discusses black culture in America. And don't miss news of a Norell sale, Suzy Menkes on why old clothes move museum tickets, an article that explores whether acupuncture can really get rid of wrinkles and a look at the two women who are the real lovers behind a West Village sculpture. See all stories from the issue >>

headline.main: Now Online | T Magazine Winter Women's Fashion 2011
